Entries.262214011/e 262214010/p Sebastian/f Seba: continue/-1000 -1000/farmer 12 11 1 Sebastian 19 11 0/addConversationTopic SebFrogFrog 6/skippable/changeToTemporaryMap IslandWest/viewport 67 12/warp farmer 69 11/faceDirection farmer 0/warp Sebastian 69 8/faceDirection Sebastian 3/showFrame Sebastian 54/fade/pause 200/emote Sebastian 56/pause 200/emote farmer 40/pause 200/emote Sebastian 8/pause 200/faceDirection Sebastian 2/pause 200/speak Sebastian "Hey @. Want to join me?#$b#I think I've found a pretty good habitat spot.$7"/pause 200/emote farmer 40/pause 200/emote Sebastian 8/pause 200/speak Sebastian "What's up?$5"/pause 200/emote farmer 40/pause 200/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/stopMusic/changeToTemporaryMap IslandFarmCave/viewport 4 7/warp farmer 5 8/warp Sebastian 4 8/faceDirection farmer 0/faceDirection Sebastian 0/fade/playMusic FrogCave/pause 300/message "So... You are the one restoring my kind."/pause 300/emote Sebastian 40/pause 300/message "You have filled the lakes and jungles with the lively croaks of the young."/pause 300/emote Sebastian 40/pause 300/message "Tell me, what is the purpose for your actions?"/pause 300/emote Sebastian 40/pause 300/emote Sebastian 40/pause 100/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 300/emote Sebastian 40/pause 200/emote farmer 28/pause 200/quickQuestion Uh oh, Sebastian might be frozen in shock...#(Nudge Sebastian.)#(Poke Sebastian.)#(Kick Sebastian.)(break)pause 200\(break)pause 200\(break)pause 200/speak Sebastian "Wha-oh!$3#$b#Uh, right.$3#$b#Um...$3"/pause 200/emote Sebastian 40/pause 200/emote farmer 28/pause 200/speak Sebastian "...Sorry, just processing.$3"/pause 200/emote Sebastian 40/pause 200/speak Sebastian "I mean, frogs are pretty cool.#$b#They've been around for hundreds of millions of years, and many can jump over twenty times their height.#$b#When @ showed me the Gourmand frog eggs they found, I realized the frogs still had a small presence in the Valley, but no one else knew enough to do anything about it.#$b#So I decided to.#$b#And I found out a lot of people actually get really interested when you present things like this in a cool way.#$b#So I've been getting a lot more help back home, and since access to the island opened up, I figured I could spread it here too.$7"/pause 200/emote Sebastian 40/pause 200/speak Sebastian "Uh, if that's alright.$2"/pause 200/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 200/stopMusic/message "..."/pause 200/message "...You spread eggs throughout the lands?"/pause 200/message "You blanket the riverbanks in wood and moss and fiber?"/pause 200/message "You enter my cave and ask for permission to continue?"/pause 300/emote Sebastian 28/pause 300/speak Sebastian "...yes?$2"/pause 300/message "..."/pause 300/message "You have it!"/playMusic FrogCave/pause 200/emote Sebastian 16/pause 200/message "It is good to hear the croaking of my kin throughout the island once more."/pause 200/message "You and your actions are welcomed here."/pause 200/emote Sebastian "I... I'm..."/pause 200/shake Sebastian 100/pause 200/emote Sebastian 40/pause 200/speak Sebastian "Thank you.$7#$b#I will.$1"/pause 200/emote farmer 32/pause 200/end/fade

Entries.262214012/e 262214011/e 262214006/e 2622: continue/-1000 -1000/farmer 1 1 2 Sebastian 9 4 3/addConversationTopic SebFrogStay 2/skippable/doAction 1 3/removeTile 1 3 Buildings/removeTile 1 2 Front/playSound keyboardTyping/showFrame Sebastian 24/animate Sebastian false true 100 26 27 26 27 26 27 26/viewport 6 6 true/move farmer 0 4 1/move farmer 5 0 1 true/playSound keyboardTyping/pause 200/playSound keyboardTyping/pause 200/speak Sebastian "Hey @.#$b#Just a second."/pause 200/emote farmer 32/pause 100/playSound keyboardTyping/pause 200/stopAnimation Sebastian/speak Sebastian "Thanks for waiting.#$b#I'm working on the frog conservation website.#$b#It's been getting a lot of hits, even from outside the Valley.$7#$b#People everywhere want to help by donating or starting their own projects.$1#$b#Haley's even trying to get me to start a social media account for it.#$b#I think I'll leave that part to her though.$2"/pause 200/emote farmer 32/pause 200/animate Sebastian false true 100 26 27 26 27 26 27 26/pause 200/emote Sebastian 40/pause 200/emote farmer 8/pause 200/speak Sebastian "You know... I used to really want to move to the city.#$b#I wanted to be a cool programmer, known for making popular video games and stuff like that.$2#$b#But ever since I started this project, I've been feeling closer to the Valley.#$b#And the people in it.$2#$b#So I've decided to stay.$7#$b#Sam and Abigail have been learning about frogs so they can help me with the habitats, and Sam's mom makes us snacks to take with us.#$b#Vincent stops by a lot too. Penny says he's been doing really well in school because of the project.$1#$b#Shane's helping me set up wildlife cameras, and Maru built these really tiny trackers that we can use to track the frogs to find out more about them.$7#$b#My mom keeps giving me tips on stuff like wood and moss.#$b#And Demetrius is really excited to continue taking soil samples to 'maintain a balanced pH for optimal growth conditions'.$7#$b#I'm still figuring out what that means exactly, but I have to admit, working with him can be kind of cool sometimes.$2"/pause 300/emote farmer 32/pause 200/emote 40/emote Sebastian 40/pause 200/speak Sebastian "What I'm trying to say is, thanks @.$7#$b#Thanks for helping me with this.$7#$b#I'll never forget it.$1"/pause 200/emote farmer 20/pause 300/end/fade

Entries.262214014/e 262214013/e 9333220/t 2000 2: continue/67 24/farmer 66 22 2 Sebastian 67 22 2/skippable/fade/pause 200/speak Sebastian "I'm so hapy about what we've built here.#$b#The frogs are thriving and healthy.#$b#More frog conservation programs are popping up in other places, taking inspiration from us.#$b#I never imagined things could get to this point.$1"/pause 200/faceDirection Sebastian 3/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 200/speak Sebastian "Thank you @.$7#$b#You're the best partner anyone could ask for.$7#$b#And I hope I can make you as happy as you've made me.$4"/pause 200/emote farmer 20/pause 200/playSound croak/pause 200/emote Sebastian 16/pause 100/playSound croak/pause 100/playSound croak/pause 200/emote Sebastian 20/pause 200/speak Sebastian "@!
